subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Euzebiusz Smolarek scored in the second half yesterday in Wolfsburg, Germany, lifting Poland to a victory in its last warm-up game against Croatia, a fellow World Cup qualifier. In Manchester, England, Peter Crouch scored three goals as England thrashed Jamaica, 6-0, in the final tune-up for the English squad. The victory came six days before Poland plays its first tournament match against Ecuador in a first-round group also including host Germany and Costa Rica. England opens Saturday against Paraguay.
